sentences.en: Brenda has long ears; someday, she's going to hear something that will upset her.
sentences.cn: 布伦达爱打听别人的事情, 总有一天, 她会听到使她心烦意乱的事情.

sentences.en: Determined to live free someday , he managed to get trained in iron molding .
sentences.cn: 他打定主意有朝一日要过自由的生活，便设法学会了铸铁这门手艺。

sentences.en: He hopes, someday, to have his own business.
sentences.cn: 他希望有一天能够拥有自己的公司。

sentences.en: I believe that he will show his true colors someday.
sentences.cn: 我相信他总有一天会现出原形的.

sentences.en: I solemnly vowed that someday I would return to live in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我郑重发誓，总有一天我将回到欧洲生活。

sentences.en: I'll hit a streak of good luck someday.
I'm terrified to think about the fact that my mother will die someday.
sentences.cn: 一想到母亲有一天会去世，我就非常恐惧。

sentences.en: I’d like to visit Japan someday.
sentences.cn: 我想将来有一天去日本。

sentences.en: It may come in handy someday.
sentences.cn: 这东西日后可能用得着。

sentences.en: Maybe you can teach me how to work on a computer someday.
sentences.cn: 改天你教教我如何使用电脑吧.

sentences.en: So you fancy yourself as the boss someday?
sentences.cn: 这么说，你是想有一天自己当上老板喽？

sentences.en: Someday he would have to smart for this foolishness.
sentences.cn: 总有一天他要为这一愚蠢的行为而吃苦头.

sentences.en: Someday we shall overcome racial intolerance.
sentences.cn: 总有一天我们会克服种族偏见.

sentences.en: The belief that someday he would succeed cheered him through many disappointments.
sentences.cn: 终有一天他会成功这个信念在多次失望中可使他快慰.

sentences.en: The use of robots will someday supersede manual labor.
sentences.cn: 机器人的使用有一天会取代人力.

sentences.en: We'll succeed so well someday that we'll work ourselves out of business.
sentences.cn: 有一天我们会如此成功,以至于使我们自己关门.

sentences.en: Young Columbus dreamed of crossing the ocean someday to the greatbeyond.
sentences.cn: 年轻时的哥伦布梦想有一日渡过大洋到达远方的彼岸.

trans.tran_en: at an unknown time in the future, especially a long time in the future
